tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PalmVeinBiometricTemplates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_name VARCHAR(255),
  palm_vein_template BLOB,
  encryption_key VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE UserAccessPermissions (
  user_id INT,
  access_level VARCHAR(50),
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE AuditLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action_performed VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp DATETIME,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE palm_vein_templates ( 
   id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   template_data BYTEA NOT NULL, 
   user_id INT NOT NULL, 
   created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), 
   encrypted BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE 
 );

CREATE TABLE palm_vein_users ( 
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
   email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
   password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
   registration_date DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE 
 );

CREATE TABLE palm_vein_templates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    template_data BYTEA,
    encryption_key BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    password TEXT,
    salt TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encryption_key BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action TEXT
)
